title: 25.雷志成、杨卫宁之死
paragraphs: 审问者：姓名？
叶文洁：叶文洁。
审问者：出生日期？
叶文洁：1947年6月。
审问者：职业？
叶文洁：清华大学物理系天体物理专业教授，2004年退休。
审问者：鉴于你的身体情况，谈话过程中你可以要求暂停休息。
叶文洁：谢谢，不用。
审问者：我们今天进行的是普通刑事案件的调查，不涉及更高层次的内容，这不是本次调查的主要部分，我们希望快些结束，希望你能配合。
叶文洁：我知道你指的是什么，我会配合的。
审问者：调查发现，在红岸基地工作期问，你有杀人嫌疑。
叶文洁：我杀死过两个人。
审问者：时间？
叶文洁：1979年10月21日下午。
审问者：受害者的姓名？
叶文洁：基地政委雷志成和基地工程师、我的丈夫扬卫宁。
审问者：讲述一下你作案的动机。
叶文洁：我……是不是能假设你对当时的相关背景有所了解？
审问者：基本了解，不清楚的我会提问。

叶文洁：好的。在接收到外星信息并回信后的当天，我得知收到该信息的不止我个人，雷志成也收到了。雷政委是那个年代典型的政治干部，政治神经很敏感，用当时的话说，就是阶级斗争这根弦绷得很紧。他背着红岸基地的大部分技术人员，在主计算机中长期后台运行着一个小程序。这个程序不断读取发射和接收的信息缓冲区，并将读到的内容存贮一个隐藏很深的加密文件中。这样，红岸系抗发射出去和接收到信息就有了一个只有他能读取的备份。正是从这个备份中，他发现了红岸接收到地外星文明信息。在我向初升的太阳发出回答信息的当天下午，也就是我从医务室中刚得知自己怀孕后，雷志成把我叫到他的办公室。我看到，他办公桌上的终端屏幕上黯然显示着昨夜收到的来自三体世界的信息……
“从接收到第一批信息到现在，已经过去了八个多小时。你没有报告，反而将原始信息删除或隐藏起来了，是吗？”
我低着头没有回答。大江大河小说
“你下一步的企图我也清楚，你打算回电。如果不是我发现得及时，整个人类文明都将毁在你手中！当然，这不是说我们惧怕来自宇宙的入侵，退一万步说，那种事真的发生了，外星侵略者必然会淹没于人民战争的汪洋大海之中！”尉官正年轻小说
我现在明白了，他还不知道我已经发出了回电。我将回答信息放入发射缓冲区时，使用的不是常规文件接口，这无意中绕开了他的监视程序。
“叶文洁，你是会做出这种事的，对于党和人民，你一直怀有刻骨的仇恨，不会放过任何一个报复的机会。你知道这样做的后果吗？”
我当然知道，于是点点头，雷志成沉默片刻，下面的话却出乎我的预料。
“叶文洁，对于你，我是不会有任何恻隐之心的，你一直都是一个与人民为敌的阶级敌人。但我与杨卫宁是多年的战友，我不能看着他和你一同彻底毁掉，更不能看着他的孩子也跟着毁掉，你有孩子了，不是吗？”
他这话并非随便说说，如果事发在那个年代，这样性质的问题，不管我丈夫与此事有无关系，都会受到很大牵连。当然还有未出世的孩子。
雷志成压低了声音说：“目前，这件情还只有我们俩知道，现在要做的，就是把这件事情的影响降到最小，你什么都不要管，就当这件事没有发生，不要向任何人挺起，包括杨卫宁。剩下的事情，就由我来处理吧。小叶啊，请相信我，只要你配合，就能避免可怕的后果。”
我立刻明白了雷志成的用心：他想成为第一个发现外星文明的人，这确实是一个名垂青史的绝好机会。
我答应了他，然后离开了办公室，这时我已经决定了一切。
我拿了一个小扳手，走进了接收系统前端处理模块的设备间，打开主机柜，将最下方的接地线的螺栓小心地拧松了。由于我时常需要检查设备，所以谁也没有注意到我干了什么。这时，接地电阻由0.6欧姆一下子上升到5欧姆，接收系统的干扰骤然增大。

值班事技术员立刻就知道是接地线故障。因为这种故障以前多次发生，判断起来很容易，但他不会想到是接地线顶端的故障，因为那里固结很好，一般没人动，况且我说刚顺便看过了。雷达峰的顶部是一种很不寻常的地质结构，覆盖着一层厚十几米的胶泥，这种胶泥层导电性很差。接地线埋下后，接地电阻总足达不到要求；把接地电极深埋也不行，因为这种胶泥层对导线有很强的腐蚀作用，时间长了可能从中部将接地线蚀断。最后只好将接地线排，从那道悬崖上垂下去，沿着崖壁一直垂到没有胶泥层的地方，将接地电极埋设在崖壁上的那个位置，即使这样接地仍然不稳定，电阻常常超标。问题都出在接地线在悬崖壁上的部分，这时维修人员就要用绳索吊下去修。那名技术员就向外围维修班打招呼，班里的一名战士在一根铁柱上系好绳索就顺着崖壁下去了，在下面折脯了半个多小时，满头大汗地上来，说找不到故障。这次监听作业眼看就要受到影响，只好上报基地指挥部。我就在悬崖顶上那个系绳索的较柱旁等着，事情果然如我预料，雷志成跟着那名战士来了。

应该说，雷志成是一名很敬业的政工干部，忠实地按照那时对他们的要求去做，与群众打一片，时时站在第一线。也许是为了做姿态，但他的确做得很好。基地极难险重的工作中都少不了他的身影，而以往他干得最多的，就是抢修接地线这个即危险又累的活。这工作虽然没有多高的技术含量，但需要经验，因为故障可能足因接地线暴露露天产生的难以察觉的接触不良，也可能是因为接地电极埋设处因干燥等原因导致的导电性差，现在负责外围维修的这批志愿兵刚刚调换过，都没有经验，所以我估计他多半要来。他系好安全带，就顺着绳索下去了，好像我不存在似的。我借口把那名战士支走了，悬崖顶上只剩下我一人，然后我从衣袋中掏出了一件东西，那是一叠短钢锯，是一条长锯条折成三段后叠在一起的，这样绳索的断口看不出是锯断的。
正在这时我丈夫杨卫宁来了。
问清事情的原由后，他向悬崖下看了看，说要是检查接地电极的话需要开挖，老雷一个人在下面太费劲。他要下去帮忙，于是系上那名战士留下的安全带。我说再拿一条绳索吧，他说不用，这条绳子就挺粗挺结实，承带两个人没问题。我坚持要拿，他说那你去吧。等我急跑着取回了另一条绳索回到悬崖顶时，他早顺着那条绳索下去了。我探头向下看，见他和雷志成已经检查完毕，正沿着同一条绳索向上爬，雷志成在前。
真的不会再有机会了，我掏出那叠钢锯，锯断了绳索。
审问者：我问一句，回答不记录。你当时的感受？
叶文洁：冷静、毫不动感情地做了。我找到了能够为之献身的事业，付出的代价，不管是自己的还是别人的，都不在乎。同时我也知道，全人类都将为这个事业付出史无前例的巨大牺牲，这仅仅是一个微不足道的开始。
审问者：好的，继续吧。
叶文洁：我听到两三声短促的惊叫，然后是身体摔到崖底乱石上的声音，等了一会儿，我看到从崖底流出的那条小溪变红了……关于这件事，我能说的就这些了。
审问者：好的，这是记录，请你仔细看看，准确无误的话，请在这儿签字。

translated_paragraphs: Interrogator: Name?
Yan Wenjie: Yan Wenjie.
Interrogator: Date of birth?
Yan Wenjie: June 1947.
Interrogator:职业?
Yan Wenjie: Professor of Physics Department, Tsinghua University, specializing in astrophysics. Retired in 2004.
Interrogator: Given your physical condition, during the course of the interrogation you may request a pause and rest.
Yan Wenjie: Thank you, I don't need it.

Investigator: We are conducting a routine criminal investigation today, and we are not involved in any higher-level matters. This is not the main part of the investigation, and we hope to wrap it up quickly. We hope you can cooperate.
Yan Wenjie: I know what you mean, and I will cooperate.
Interrogator: The investigation found that during your work at the Red Beach Base, you had the suspicion of murder.
Yan Wenyi: I have killed two people.
Interrogator: Time?
Yan Wenjie: October 21, afternoon of 1979.
Interrogator: What is the victim's name?
Yan Weijie: Commissar Lei Zhicheng and Engineer Yang Weining, my husband, of the Base.
Interrogator: Tell me about your motives for committing the crime.
Yan Wenjie: Can I assume that you have some understanding of the background at that time?
Interrogator: Basic understanding, I will ask if unsure.

Yan Wenchao: Okay. On the day we received the extraterrestrial information and replied, I learned that not only I received it, but so did Lei Zhi Cheng. Lei Zhi Cheng was a typical political cadre of that era, with a highly sensitive political nerve. As they said at the time, the class struggle was a tight string. He carried out a small program in the main computer of the Red Shore Base, which was always running in the background. This program continuously read the buffer of发射 and received information and stored the content in a hidden and encrypted file. In this way, Red Shore had a backup of receiving and emitting information that only he could read. It was from this backup that he discovered the information of extraterrestrial civilization received by Red Shore. On the afternoon of the day I sent the answer information to the rising sun, which was the day I found out I was pregnant, Lei Zhi Cheng called me to his office. I saw that the terminal screen on his desk was dimly displaying the information received from the Three-body World the night before...
"More than eight hours have passed since we received the first batch of information. Have you not reported it, but instead deleted or hidden the original information?"
I did not answer, bowing my head. The River of No Return novel.

"I know what your next move is, and you plan to reply. If I had not discovered it in time, human civilization would have been destroyed by you! Of course, this does not mean that we are afraid of extraterrestrial invasions. Even if such an event were to happen, the extraterrestrial invaders would be overwhelmed by the ocean of people's war!" Officer Young Novel

I now understand that he is still unaware that I have sent a reply. When I placed the information in the transmission buffer, I did not use the常规 file interface, which inadvertently bypassed his monitoring program.

Yan Wenhao, you would do such a thing. You have always harbored a deep hatred towards the Party and the people. You will not miss any opportunity to take revenge. Do you know the consequences of what you are doing?
I of course know, so I nodded and Lei Zhi Cheng was silent for a moment, but the words that came out of his mouth surprised me.

"You, Ye Wenjie, have no mercy in my heart. You have always been an enemy of the people. But I have been a comrade-in-arms with Yang Weining for many years. I cannot watch him and you completely destroy each other, and I cannot watch his children also be destroyed. Don't you have children?"

He didn't say it lightly. If such a problem occurred in that era, regardless of whether my husband had any relationship with this matter, he would be greatly implicated. Of course, there were also unborn children.

Ray志成 whispered, "Right now, only we two know about this matter. What we need to do now is to minimize the impact of this matter. You don't need to care about anything. Just pretend that this matter never happened. Don't raise your head to anyone, including Yang Weining. I will handle the rest. Young Ye, please believe me. As long as you cooperate, you can avoid terrible consequences."

I immediately understood Li Zhi Cheng's intention: he wanted to be the first person to discover extraterrestrial civilization, which was truly a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be recorded in history.
I agreed with him and then left the office, and by then I had made up my mind about everything.

I picked up a small wrench and walked into the device room of the front-end processing module of the receiving system. I opened the host cabinet and carefully tightened the screws of the ground wire at the bottom. Since I often need to inspect the equipment, nobody noticed what I did. At this time, the ground resistance suddenly increased from 0.6 ohms to 5 ohms, and the interference of the receiving system increased sharply.

The technical assistant immediately knew that it was an earth fault, because this kind of fault had occurred many times before, and it was easy to diagnose, but he never thought it was an earth fault at the top of the grounding wire, because the ground was solidly bound, and no one had ever touched it, and I said I had just taken a look. The radar peak is an unusual geological structure covered by a layer of thick胶泥 several meters thick. This layer of胶泥 has poor electrical conductivity. After the grounding wire was buried, the grounding resistance was always less than the required value; burying the grounding electrode deep was also not possible, because this layer of胶泥 had strong corrosion作用 on the grounding wire, and over time it may cut off the grounding wire from the middle. Finally, the grounding wire was pulled out and hung down from the cliff, following the cliff wall all the way down to the place where there was no胶泥 layer, and the grounding electrode was buried in the position on the cliff wall. Even so, grounding was still unstable, and the resistance often exceeded the required value. The problem was all in the part of the grounding wire on the cliff wall. At this time, the maintenance personnel had to use a rope to descend. The technical assistant then contacted the outer maintenance unit, and a soldier in the unit tied a rope to a steel pillar and descended along the cliff wall for more than half an hour, with sweat dripping from his head and returned to the top, saying that he could not find the fault. This listening operation was about to be affected, so it was reported to the base command center. I was waiting at the pillar next to the rope that was tied to the pole, and as I expected, Lei Zhi Cheng came with that soldier.

It should be said that Lei Zhi Cheng is a very dedicated political and administrative cadre who conscientiously carries out their requirements at that time and stands in the same boat with the masses, always standing on the front line. Perhaps it is to make a gesture, but he really does a good job. In the extremely difficult and hazardous work of the base, his figure is always present, and the work he has done the most in the past is to repair grounding wires, which is both dangerous and tiring. This work may not have a high level of technical content, but it requires experience because faults may be caused by poor contact between grounding wires exposed to the open air or by poor conductivity of grounding electrodes buried due to dryness, etc. The volunteers who are responsible for outer repair have just been replaced, and they all lack experience. Therefore, I estimate that he will definitely come. He fastened his safety belt and descended down the rope as if I didn't exist. I pretended to send away the soldier who was standing there, leaving only I on the cliff top. Then I took out something from my pocket, which was a stack of short steel saws and a long saw that had been folded into three segments and stacked together. This way, the cut in the rope wouldn't be noticeable that it was cut with a saw.
And at that moment, my husband Yang Weining came.

After asking for the reason of the matter, he looked down at the cliff and said that if he were to check the grounding electrode, he would have to dig, and it was too tiring for Old Lei to do it alone. He wanted to go down to help, so he fastened the safety belt left by the soldier. I said that I should get another rope, but he said that it was not necessary, that this rope was thick and strong enough to carry two people. I insisted on getting it, but he said, "Then go." When I ran back to get the other rope, he had already descended by the rope. I looked down and saw that he and Lei Zhi Cheng had finished checking and were climbing up the same rope. Lei Zhi Cheng was in front.
There will be no more chances. I pull out the stack of saws and cut the rope.
Interrogator: I ask one question, and I do not record your answer. What was your feeling at that time?

Yan Wenjie: I did it calmly and without any emotional attachment. I found a career that I was willing to dedicate myself to, and I didn't care about the cost, whether it was my own or someone else's. At the same time, I also knew that humanity would make unprecedented huge sacrifices for this cause, and this was only the beginning.
Interrogator: Alright, proceed.

Yan Wenchao: I heard a few brief screams, followed by the sound of a body hitting the rocks at the bottom of the cliff, and then there was silence. After a while, I saw that the small stream flowing from the bottom of the cliff had turned red...That's all I can say about this.
Interrogator: Okay, here's the record. Please take a good look and make sure there are no errors. If everything is correct, please sign here.
